messages.message:
Hi team, as a part of RabbitMQ HA project, I was trying to understand RMQ usage by various services in iB.
We are using Classic Mirroring which is now deprecated in favour of quorum queues. And as far as I understand, we use “message priority” in our services. Is it still the case?
Please help tag relevant teams/folks who might know about this. cc: @Sabyasachi Roy @sudeep
since Quorum Queues do not support message priority, this might turn out to be a blocker.
@shaunak @Anil - just flagging this up. Do we use message priorities for celery in flow?
yes we do use it cc @lenny
thanks! can you share some of the usage details?
Jobs have a priority associated with them, when we send tasks to celery through rmq we pass the priority through so the higher-priority tasks are picked up by workers first
thanks! fyi @abhishek when you are there ^^
